inclusion.criterion: having been diagnosed with vesico-sphincteric disorders of neurological origin (spinal cord injury, multiple sclerosis, parkinsonian syndromes, ponytail syndrome)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: requiring self-catheterization and having a prescription for a GentleCath™ Air catheter
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current participation in another clinical research
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Patients not able to complete questionnaires
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has a history of CVA, neurogenic bladder with indwelling suprapubic catheter and multiple prior admissions for UTIs. Urologist is not concerned with leaking around the cath site.
